Reviews.Title: Great camera bundle package!
Reviews.Author: Laura Doty
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery, packaged well, all pieces just as described...great deal.  I wanted a compact camera with best available features and this was it!  I'm enjoying using it and pleased with the bundle deal!

Reviews.Title: takes fantastic photos!
Reviews.Author: S. McCarthy
Reviews.Content: The only camera that takes photos of our black dog where you can actually see her eyes - the clarity and contrast are fantastic!  So far, does well in all light conditions.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Christopher Scarpetti
Reviews.Content: I love the camera it is easy to use and operator friendly.  HOWEVER there is NO manual that that comes with it. I had do find an online version to reference.

Sony 32GB  Class 10 Memory Card - Sony Soft Carry Case - Full Size Tripod

Wasabi Rechargeable Battery Pack NP-BX1 - Top Brand MMC MultimediaCard & SD Secure Digital Reader USB
Zeikos Professional Wrist Grip Strap for Digital and Film SLR Cameras
